content.rendered:
Our Leadership

Incopro’s team is comprised of highly talented individuals who bring a vast amount of expertise in IP & brand protection. Their skills combine to deliver innovative technology solutions to businesses facing online IP infringement challenges.

Our experts in IP law, investigation, engineering and technical design, who between them are proficient in over 40 languages, deliver effective global protection for your IP.

Incopro believes in creating an open and collaborative environment where talented people from a multitude of backgrounds can come together, develop their skills and grow professionally.

  • See LinkedIn

    Simon Baggs

    Chief Executive Officer & Co – Founder

Request your Demo

The demo is personalized for you. Get answers to your questions and find out why Incopro is the right choice for you.
